item.title: Patchify release 1.13.7 patch notes:
item.description:
-Fixed small Overwatch bug

-Fixed notification appearing as white square bug

item.title: Patchify release 1.13.6 patch notes:
item.description:
-Added World Of Warcraft

-Added Overwatch

-Fixed SOT and ARK a bit more...

-Standardised date format to dd-MMM-yyyy (susceptible to change)

-Links will now open in a webview and not browser

item.title: Patchify release 1.13.4 patch notes:
item.description:
-Fixed Sea Of Thieves updates yet again...

-Fixed ARK updates yet again...

-Added Minecraft Java notifications

-Added Share App Button

-Auto sub to patchify on app start

-Worked on Database optimisations

item.title: Patchify release 1.13.3 patch notes:
item.description:
-Fixed Sea Of Thieves updates (again)

-Added Minecraft Bedrock (notifications are not yet configured)

-Added Minecraft Java (notifications are not yet configured)

item.title: Patchify Update 1.13.2
item.description: Patchify release 1.13.2 patch notes: -Database Revamp -Users can now sync their subscriptions across all their devices! -Fixed Sea Of Thieves updates -Fixed ARK updates
